Tower of Fate Tutorial:
The Tower of Fate:
In Tower of Fate, you'll have to complete a long journey in the Tower of Insolence, you'll start on the first floor and you'll have to climb the entire tower by defeating every enemy on each floor, you'll face several bosses along the way. Complete all floors and face the chief supreme on the 13th floor. (You need to be on command channel with minimum 11 members and max 36 at level 82+)
